website_summaries.verdict: The spray gel to consider if you want a product focused on men's hair styles and types.
pros: Extremely easy to apply for a medium hold
Does a good job of keeping the hairstyle firm throughout the day without much preparation in the morning
Comes with an alcohol-free formula and small amount of sunscreen to protect the scalp from sun burning on hot summer days
cons: Spray pattern is too direct and narrow to cover a large portion of hair in one spray

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good product, accurately described by the seller
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product, accurately described by the seller. It is a "medium hold" not firm. As another reviewer related, the best way to apply is to spray into your hand and then rub into your hair. That works well rather than spraying directly which wastes product. There are gels and liquids made for women that work well also, but of course, they cost much more. American Crew is for us guys and they do their thing well.
customer_reviews.author: W. Giles

customer_reviews.title: Best ever for short spikey hair....for WOMEN!
customer_reviews.text: I just pre-dampen my hair with a little leave in spray hair conditioner, give a few squirts of this Crew Medium Spray Gel and I am set for the day! if I am out alllll day....i just slightly dampen my hands with a little water, run it through my hair to re-activate the gel, and Voila! I am good to go for another many hours. I have been using this product since it came out. Don't ever stop making it please!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Nana

customer_reviews.title: Lost Product because Lid Was Not On Properly
customer_reviews.text: While this product is a great medium hold product, and I would give it a 5 star review for how it works, the problem is that the lid was not on tight and a good deal of the product leaked into the box. The remaining product therefore became more expensive per ounce. Also, I sent an email to the retailer about this problem and they simply ignored my issue. I therefore give this a 2 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a guy
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old son loves this product. I was looking for a product that I would like and bought about 10 different brands after mine was discontinued. I gave my son all of my rejects and he loved Crew the best. In fact, he's now on his 2nd bottle and was getting anxious wondering if it would be delivered before he ran out. He's says it's perfect for a guy.
customer_reviews.author: Tlarson

customer_reviews.title: product fan for more than 15 years
customer_reviews.text: One and only product my husband will use! They been in each others lives for more than 15 years, he has coarse, unruly hair and this is the only product that gives him control without massive build up or stickiness. I have been saving anywhere between 40 and 30% by ordering it through amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Learning4life

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by a stylist.
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me by a person in a hair salon who was giving me a haircut. She could smell the product that I was already using and explained why this would be better. My hair is very fine and requires product to hold it in place and had to use a lot of my aerosol spray to do this. I actually still use my original aerosol hair spray sparingly first to hold my hair in place in place long enough for me to use this product to "freeze" it. This spray easily holds my hair in place for the entire day.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Schwendinger

customer_reviews.title: GIRLS LIKE TOOOOO.....
customer_reviews.text: Actually I am female, and I have a super short spiked cut and my stylist recommended this product to me (even tho male product) It is SUPER AWESOME. One of the best products I have found for this cut. And you should also try the GEL (that u squeeze into palm). Both items great for gals as for guys.....
customer_reviews.author: Joann B.

customer_reviews.title: Classic scent
customer_reviews.text: Just the right amount of hold. After it dries, I gently brush it out to make my hair extra soft and manageable. Incredible manly scent that's not too strong. My hair always looks it's best after using American Crew shampoo and this medium hold spray. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this stuff....
customer_reviews.text: I always buy this for my husband, he loves that it holds so well without making his hair stiff. He also likes that it doesn't leave horrible flakey white stuff when it comes out.. Sounds weird but some gels and sprays do that. It holds very well and looks great on his hair. The medium hold is awesome because it has a gel look to it but it still allows your hair to look natural and not overgeled. The fact that it is a spray makes styling extremely easy, he simply sprays throughout his hair and fixes it the way he wants with his fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Good body and hold
customer_reviews.text: Used it as directed and found it a nice way to look natural without any real stiffening of my light hair. Would have like it with more stiffening but it's hot and humid now and the best product I found for a guy to use.
customer_reviews.author: D. Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting styling wear.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my son; he loves it. It styles his hair without being sticky or gooey. Need I say he is a first grader and his hair stays put a full school day despite all of his running during recess and PE. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Onsurez

customer_reviews.title: Go with the pro.
customer_reviews.text: Get the spray your stylist uses at considerable savings. Nice holding spray applied with an environmentally friendly pump. Hair stays in place, yet feels natural.
customer_reviews.author: Hackton

customer_reviews.title: Light duty hold, keeps you adorable on the back and sides
customer_reviews.text: My son, who is adorable, uses this for the crown, back and sides of his hair. It is pretty light-duty and adds just enough hold to keep his hair from moving around a lot. Which it doesn't really do anyway, because it's so short. Then he progresses to using regular gel for the front, where the real action is.
customer_reviews.author: That Girl Said

customer_reviews.title: Great scent, no flakes.
customer_reviews.text: The product has a great scent. It also makes the hair look thicker and manageable. The only thing I wished it did was to add a shine. Also, wish it was a bit cheaper. Maybe 5 go 6 bucks range. Overall good product for those who don't want to put glue in their hair.
customer_reviews.author: Shan Gabbar

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE FOR MEN!
customer_reviews.text: Great item! Nice light scent and decent hold. I also use a little hairspray as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because you can get it wet without it turning to a sticky glue.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Item as described
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. It's all he will use. Not flaky and holds well. Nice scent.
customer_reviews.author: Daphnern

customer_reviews.title: Medium hold does a great job of holding my hair in place without looking ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this product as a gift from my Uncle who no longer needs hair care products. Skeptical at first, I have grown very fond of it. Medium hold does a great job of holding my hair in place without looking wet, or leaving residue on your hands after touching it. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: dPrimmy

customer_reviews.title: excelent product
customer_reviews.text: Been using this item for a long time. Love that i can order it at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Gunz

customer_reviews.title: It's worth the money to have a product that holds hair reasonably in place comfortably without any residue
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for probably a decade. It's worth the money to have a product that holds hair reasonably in place comfortably without any residue. It smells decent and when applied it doesn't give the appearance that any product is being used at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Crunchy Hair
customer_reviews.text: I so badly wanted to love this product as much as other Crew products. I'm female, bought this product to help hold and define my curls, but it left my hair crunchy.
customer_reviews.author: KSB

customer_reviews.title: I’m a first-time user of this product it does not ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m a first-time user of this product it does not leave my hair sticky or greasy it’s just the right amount to hold for my hairstyle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Might be good in a pinch if you don't have much time ...
customer_reviews.text: No real hold. Doesn't really seem to do much. Haven't really touched it after the handful of times I tried it. I definitely prefer the American Crew fiber. Might be good in a pinch if you don't have much time to style your hair and spray a lot of it on your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Val

customer_reviews.title: Great Hold
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great smell, not too smelly. Hold is great.
customer_reviews.author: Laurent Jacquemin

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: Comes out of the bottle in more of a stream than a spray
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is great. I prefer it
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I prefer it. It doesn't leave my hair as a hard shell or turn to white flakes with time. It also smells good. It just doesn't always spray very well. You need to push the plunger down firmly in order to get a good aerosol spray instead of a stream, but this might also dispense more than you wanted. Takes some getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: Neil J

customer_reviews.title: I do like the performance of the gel
customer_reviews.text: I do like the performance of the gel. It does it's job. My problem was with the shipping. They put a large peice of tape over the cap that continued on both sides of the bottle. After removing the tape, the entire bottle was now sticky from the tape residue. But other than that it's all good.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Cushman

customer_reviews.title: A little dab will do ya!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Crew hair products for men for a long time, and I have NEVER been disappointed. This purchase was no exception, other than the atomizer (spray head) only releases the product in a stream. Otherwise all good, however the product seems weaker than my last bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Ed C. in NC.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Spray Gel. Smells Good.
customer_reviews.text: My teenage sons use this for bedhead, to fix their hair. This is easier to use and less messy than regular gel. It also smells nice. If you use too much, your hair will be crunchy. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: JRA

customer_reviews.title: Better than gels
customer_reviews.text: Liked better than gel. Easier to use but it was hard to find locally.
customer_reviews.author: nnafpw3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for man or woman
customer_reviews.text: We love this stuff on her hair and it also spray as well
customer_reviews.author: Mona Botkins

customer_reviews.title: Crew
customer_reviews.text: As described. Have used for a long time. Much cheaper than salons.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ordway

customer_reviews.title: Good balance between holding hair in place and not looking greasy.
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job of holding hair in place through most events while looking natural and having a pleasant scent.
customer_reviews.author: MN

customer_reviews.title: Great hair care product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Have been using it daily for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S Slotkin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the only grooming spray I use. Doesn't take much and doesn't leave hair super stiff
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to find in stores. This is my new place and cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Used it for years and love it. Never thought to get here
customer_reviews.author: Rob Barbour

customer_reviews.title: Bad spray head.
customer_reviews.text: Gel spray? Spray? More like jet stream. Iam supposed to be able to spray this gel onto my hair and not jettison it on my scalp. Abolute terrible spray head.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: always does a good job of keeping my hair controlled
customer_reviews.text: always does a good job of keeping my hair controlled, without being sticky or greasy. I appreciate the spray - you don't have to deal with goopy pomades.
customer_reviews.author: amp

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: This is a okay product... It smells nice but doesn't hold well & is way overpriced. Probably won't buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca N.

customer_reviews.title: Number one product!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for at least 10 years and would not use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: tom rampey

customer_reviews.title: Tame Frizzy Thick Hair
customer_reviews.text: Love Love this product. My hair dresser recommend me to use even though it is for men. Even my daughter has started using it for her hair. We have frizzy, thick hair and this keeps it tamed.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy C

customer_reviews.title: Great form of gel
customer_reviews.text: Great form of gel. Spray is the innovation here. Allows easy application without all the sticky fingers. Spray to appropriate level of coverage/hold and brush in. Reignite the hold/look with a bit of water later in day. Nice outcome with every application.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Racing

customer_reviews.title: Very good product at a much cheaper price than anywhere else.
customer_reviews.text: The bottle I received was exactly what I was looking for and at a much better price that I have been able to find it anywhere else. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Charles K. Mobley

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product works for my hair. Light hold with little residue.
customer_reviews.author: C S

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: keeps hair looking nice but doest quite hold up to a summer breeze, some hair parts fall
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Holds great, not sticky
customer_reviews.text: This keeps my hair in place without making my hair feel sticky. One tip: less is more. I've found that using just a few quick squirts seems to work just as well if not better than using a lot.
customer_reviews.author: RGX

customer_reviews.title: Decent for use!
customer_reviews.text: Not the worst and not the best but it works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Alwin Vang

customer_reviews.title: Great hold, but
customer_reviews.text: If you put this gel on, your hairstyle will not move much until you comb it out - even in Atlantic winds and windy NYC days. Great hold, but ... Difficult to comb out. Smells shower fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Randy A. Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, now if I can just keep my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff,now if I can just keep my son form using it all up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: My hubby got hooked on this at the shop where he was getting his hair cut and the last few times he's wanted more we haven't been able to find it locally. Very please with the product and the delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Lblazin

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting the grooming spray, not medium hold spray gel. Please specify this on the description.
customer_reviews.author: WSpencer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the ease of using a spray gel. Holds his hair in place without looking stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Vietze

customer_reviews.title: Works well nice smell also
customer_reviews.text: Light weight product for hair. Works well nice smell also.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Starr

customer_reviews.title: Hair
customer_reviews.text: Good product does what I needed to do holds my hair in place
customer_reviews.author: Jay S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using all of crew hair products for many years
customer_reviews.author: don ray rogers

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the feeling of this in my hair
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the feeling of this in my hair, it makes it feel rough and it dries out my hair, even though it doesn't have alcohol in it. Hair paste is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Samtastic

customer_reviews.title: Hair won't cooperate?
customer_reviews.text: Do you have hair that just won't hold form, no matter how many times you brush it, or tell it nice things? Break its spirit and douse it with American Crew Spray Gel, and worry no more if your hair it out of place. High winds will no longer be a problem for you, Mr. Looking-Professional-All-The-Time-Man, so take a load off, and know that everybody is looking at you, and wishing they had your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Furrow

customer_reviews.title: Holds well!
customer_reviews.text: It holds your hair in place well. However it is over priced for a small bottle of hair spray.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Stepina

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good stuff... Works as described. If you have longer hair check out Jack Black Sleek Finish Texture Cream with Olive and Rosemary.
customer_reviews.author: C. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Scent is amazing. The hold is pretty good. should last the day.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Seggelke

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: A little sticky when applied and smell could be better
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Husband's favorite hair product- really hard to find in the stores ...
customer_reviews.text: Husband's favorite hair product- really hard to find in the stores here. He said it has good hold without making his hair look like a helmet!
customer_reviews.author: MaryA

customer_reviews.title: Looking Good!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using American Crew for several years now. A little spray here and there keeps my hair in place all day. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: OldManHawg

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was ok. Average home felt a bit greasy
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: This is my second order for this item
customer_reviews.text: I've used this spray since my hair began to thin (about 15 years). It works great with no order. I save about 40% by ordering from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Russ B

customer_reviews.title: Spray works for me.
customer_reviews.text: I find that the spray is easier to use, and gives me same style hold that regurlar gel does, with less effort.
customer_reviews.author: MR TERRY L PECK

customer_reviews.title: Spray gel
customer_reviews.text: The gel comes out in a stream not a mist like it should. I threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard C.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this for my husband, but I use ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband, but I use it the most. It's not just for men in my opinion. It really helps set the curls with the curling iron.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Brunnemer

customer_reviews.title: A winner
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these to try and it works great
customer_reviews.author: Paul Twain

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: is just not as a good as i was expecting
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spray Gel
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for a long time. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: David T.

customer_reviews.title: good price online...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the hubby..... he loves this stuff.... good price online....
customer_reviews.author: L. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived earlier than promised and it is as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Octavio Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Even for the Ladies
customer_reviews.text: I really love this spray gel (and I’m a girl) Maybe I’m breaking the ladies code by using a men’s product (and the scent is pretty manly) but whatever, this is my favorite spray gel that I’ve used and it works really good on keeping my curls without making me crunchy (just use sparingly with a curl cream) deal with it, I’m using your stuff boys!
customer_reviews.author: K. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this gel, it has a nice smells and keeps hold for long periods of time!
customer_reviews.author: Jclouddog

customer_reviews.title: ... this product years ago and it is still my favorite. Its easy to use and has a great ...
customer_reviews.text: Started using this product years ago and it is still my favorite. Its easy to use and has a great smell to it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Whitam

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Spray is too much of stream and not mist.won't cover well
customer_reviews.author: JOHN T HOBAN

customer_reviews.title: What I expected
customer_reviews.text: While moderately expensive and difficult to find in retail stores, it is worth it. Cheaper products have caused rashes on the scalp. Great holding power in a spray gel.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Waters

customer_reviews.title: You use it like hair spray
customer_reviews.text: You use it like hair spray. Results in a very natural look and feel. You (or someone else) can run your fingers through your hair. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: TRB

customer_reviews.title: Fav Man Hair Tamer
customer_reviews.text: This isn't being sold here locally anymore, I don't know why. It is my honey's fav man hair tamer. It is exactly what he had gotten in the past, and I was glad to get it online for him.
customer_reviews.author: MAD

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this before and was having trouble finding it in our local stores.Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn J. Haisch

customer_reviews.title: American Crew Spray Gel Medium Hold
customer_reviews.text: One of The Best Spray Gel's By far, Not Perfumy And Holds very Strong, Lasts Longer than Any Other I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Taysom

customer_reviews.title: I like it. Don't use too many pumps or it ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Don't use too many pumps or it will get stiff. I didn't like it on wet hair. For me it worked best on dry hair. If you use on wet hair use no more than two. It gives a good hold! I have wavy very thick hair with curls.
customer_reviews.author: GermanTickler

customer_reviews.title: Best I have found!
customer_reviews.text: I hate hairsprays...the smell, the aerosol spray that gets all over everything. This product keeps my hair from getting messed up at work and doesn't have all those negatives. I find it's exactly what I need. I bought 2 bottles...
customer_reviews.author: Paul the Bass Man

customer_reviews.title: Great hair product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It provides a soft hold for hair and allows for proper styling.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: More like Light Hold
customer_reviews.text: Eh, not what I wanted. I got other Crew products that I really liked. Went for cheap Axe gel after this one and am very happy with those.
customer_reviews.author: LiquidShock786

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: didn't help in styling .. hold not medium ... returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Raviraj S.

customer_reviews.title: It just doesn't hold fine hair at all
customer_reviews.text: It just doesn't hold fine hair at all. Agreed there is no film created or residue but what's the point if it doesn't hold?
customer_reviews.author: K. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what type of hair this medium hold spray "gel" would work on. My hair has a lot a of body and this does next to nothing to control it the way I brush it. I have to believe that people with hair with little to no body would find it useless. I got it, thinking their firm hold may have been too firm. I'm back to using the firm hold, which DOES work. Also, this spray "gel" is NO gel.
customer_reviews.author: buy by reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Good price. But spray is messy.
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price. However, I now see that the spray bottle is not for me. I find it difficult to get the product where I need it. And the sticky gel settles around the bathroom. So I screw off the spray nozzle, poor some in my hands, and apply it by hand. In future, I'll just buy the regular bottle without spray.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Russom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boys to use because we have not had much luck in the past with gels hoping their hair styles. I love that this is a spray gel so my kids don't have Globs of gel all over my sink. It works great on my five-year-old spiked hair also and smells fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sara S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Spray Gel
customer_reviews.text: Spray Gel is hard to find now. Sometimes I don't want to get my hands all sticky. This product does a good job of holding my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jose O. Calderon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Light Hold
customer_reviews.text: It is challenging to find a light weight spritz, gel or spray for men which doesn't have a distinct fragrance. This product works great and I intend on using it in the future. Great prices.
customer_reviews.author: D. Aschliman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gel for active guys....
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing gel for active guys. I love to just be able to spray my hair and style and go and it holds my style all day. I love the shine it adds to my hair as well. The smell is fantastic without being strong. I will be using this product for a long time. I love the entire Crew line. Great products.
customer_reviews.author: H. Tharp

customer_reviews.title: This is not the genuine product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years, the bottle says it's medium hold spray gel but it's not. It smells like bad old lady hair spray and is incredibly stiff. I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great medium hold hair spray
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go-to hairspray for years. I just need some light control while my hair dries, and then I'm good. This spray will dry stiff, but running my hand through my hair breaks it up and my hair feels smooth and natural, and it stays in place. Very happy with this, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rick O'Shea

customer_reviews.title: Best product for men
customer_reviews.text: My husband has used for years. We never ordered before Covid19...but will continue to now.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Mahin

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Way less expensive that you pay for it at the salon.
customer_reviews.author: ARad

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This product is exceptional for my wavy black hair. I have tried many gels and sprays and this one works the best. I will be a new lifetime customer!
customer_reviews.author: QC

customer_reviews.title: Product delivered as ordered and when promised.
customer_reviews.text: It's a standard product, I've reordered it several times. The vendor delivers on schedule at a reasonable price point.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN J BLUNDEN
